subject: Athletics and Sports
Freedom of Speech and Expression
Basketball
Madison Square Garden
lead_paragraph: A fan at Wednesday’s Knicks game claims that he was told that he would be ejected from Madison Square Garden if he did not stop yelling criticism at Isiah Thomas.
snippet: A fan at Wednesday’s Knicks game claims that he was told that he would be ejected from Madison Square Garden if he did not stop yelling criticism at Isiah Thomas.
